headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Baker Hughes (BKR) After Its Strong Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Baker Hughes is still fairly priced after its strong run, this article will walk through what the numbers are saying about its current value. The stock last closed at US$64.72, with returns of 8.1% over 7 days, 20.0% over 30 days, 37.3% year to date, 49.9% over 1 year and 126.5% over 3 years. This naturally raises questions about how much upside or downside might now be priced in. Recent coverage of Baker Hughes has focused on its role as a major energy services...
